text: Valentino el argentino is a Spanish-language telenovela produced by Pol-ka Producciones and Vista Producciones filmed between Argentina and Colombia. It premiered on El Trece in Argentina on 7 October 2008, followed by its debut on RCN Televisión in Colombia on 27 October 2008. The series was created by Juana Uribe and Adrián Suar for the respective television channels in Argentina and Colombia, and it stars Julián Román, and Segundo Cernadas as the title character's. It is considered one of the five Colombian productions most hated by the public. On the other hand, the telenovela was only on the air for three days on RCN Televisión, and was subsequently taken off the air due to its low reception by the public. == Cast == * Julián Román as Valentino * Liliana González as Margarita * Segundo Cernadas as Alter ego * Ana Lucía Domínguez as Claudia * Luly Bossa as Teresa * Pablo Alarcón as Marcos * Héctor Calori as Modestio * Matías Santoianni as Omar * Víctor Mallarino as Dr. Correa * Alejandro Fiore as Chanfarella * Adriana Salgueiro as Tete * Diego Díaz as Cristian * Gisela Van Lacke as Fernanda * Carolina Márquez as Paty * Luz Cipriota as Anahí * Santiago de Jesús Díaz as Robinson * Cristina Alberó as Lidia * Irene Goldszer as Dulce * Santiago Ramundo as Marcelo == References == == External links == * Category:2008 telenovelas Category:Argentine telenovelas Category:Colombian telenovelas Category:2008 Colombian television series debuts Category:2008 Colombian television series endings Category:2008 Argentine television series debuts Category:2009 Argentine television series endings Category:RCN Televisión telenovelas Category:El Trece telenovelas Category:Spanish-language telenovelas Category:Spanish-language television shows
title: Valentino el argentino
